function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of Covid-19 on pace and nature of whole energy system change","Impact":"Uncertainty and disruption in energy system transitions, potential setbacks in low carbon energy growth","Mitigation":"Flexible and adaptive strategies, scenario planning, diversification of energy sources","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, energy storage solutions, smart grid technologies","People":"Energy planners, policymakers, industries, and communities","Owner":"Government agencies, energy companies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Historical price crashes and demand shocks leaving marks on global energy system","Impact":"Instability and volatility in energy markets, challenges for investment and planning","Mitigation":"Strategic stockpiling, risk hedging, long-term contract mechanisms","Technologies":"Market analytics, risk assessment tools, energy trading platforms","People":"Investors, financial institutions, energy companies","Owner":"Market regulators, financial institutions, energy companies"},{"Description":"Uncertainties about the structure of global energy system in 2030 due to pandemic","Impact":"Risk of suboptimal energy system development, potential inefficiencies and misallocation of resources","Mitigation":"Continuous scenario analysis, adaptive policy frameworks, international cooperation on energy planning","Technologies":"Energy modeling and simulation, data analytics, international collaboration platforms","People":"Energy experts, policymakers, global institutions","Owner":"Research institutions, international organizations, collaborative networks"}]}
